analysis: The documents in this cluster primarily concern actions taken by the US government, often the President, during times of war or national emergency. These actions include authorizing government officials to manage resources, take control of facilities experiencing labor disputes, and reorganize government agencies to support the war effort. A recurring theme is the invocation of war powers acts and the delegation of authority to various departments and agencies to ensure the effective prosecution of war or to address national emergencies.
title: Emergency Powers and Resource Control
